mapper.update: update l_inspect_item set inspectitemid=inspectitemid ,itemname=#{itemname} ,itemfield=#{itemfield} ,itemratefield=#{itemratefield} ,isdedu=#{isdedu} where inspectitemid=#{inspectitemid}

update l_inspect_item set inspectitemid=inspectitemid ,itemname=#{itemname} ,itemfield=#{itemfield} ,itemratefield=#{itemratefield} ,isdedu=#{isdedu} where 1=1 and inspectitemid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and inspectitemid =#{Where_Id} and inspectitemid=#{Where_inspectitemid} and itemname=#{Where_itemname} and itemfield=#{Where_itemfield} and itemratefield=#{Where_itemratefield} and isdedu=#{Where_isdedu}
mapper.select: select t.inspectitemid "inspectitemid", t.itemname "itemname", t.itemfield "itemfield", t.itemratefield "itemratefield", t.isdedu "isdedu" from l_inspect_item t where inspectitemid=#{inspectitemid}

select t.inspectitemid "inspectitemid", t.itemname "itemname", t.itemfield "itemfield", t.itemratefield "itemratefield", t.isdedu "isdedu" from l_inspect_item t where 1=1 and t.inspectitemid=#{inspectitemid} and t.itemname=#{itemname} and t.itemfield=#{itemfield} and t.itemratefield=#{itemratefield} and t.isdedu=#{isdedu}

select t.inspectitemid "inspectitemid", t.itemname "itemname", t.itemfield "itemfield", t.itemratefield "itemratefield", t.isdedu "isdedu" from l_inspect_item t where 1=1 and t.inspectitemid=#{inspectitemid} and t.itemname=#{itemname} and t.itemfield=#{itemfield} and t.itemratefield=#{itemratefield} and t.isdedu=#{isdedu}
mapper.delete: delete from l_inspect_item where 1=1 and inspectitemid in (${Where_IdsStr}) and inspectitemid =#{Where_Id} and inspectitemid=#{Where_inspectitemid} and itemname=#{Where_itemname} and itemfield=#{Where_itemfield} and itemratefield=#{Where_itemratefield} and isdedu=#{Where_isdedu}
mapper.select: select t.inspectitemid "inspectitemid", t.itemname "itemname", t.itemfield "itemfield", t.itemratefield "itemratefield", t.isdedu "isdedu" from l_inspect_item t where 1=1 and t.inspectitemid=#{inspectitemid} and t.itemname=#{itemname} and t.itemfield=#{itemfield} and t.itemratefield=#{itemratefield} and t.isdedu=#{isdedu}

select count(*) from l_inspect_item t where 1=1 and t.inspectitemid=#{inspectitemid} and t.inspectitemid!=#{NoId} and t.itemname=#{itemname} and t.itemfield=#{itemfield} and t.itemratefield=#{itemratefield} and t.isdedu=#{isdedu}
